IntroText: Let your viewers apply for giveways and draw the winners live in your stream!
Features1Text: Just add the lottery URL in OBS or XSlit and see the magic happen!
Features2Text: Manage multiple lotterys, get usage statistics and more!
Features3Text: It's really simple to use and to customize!
Showcase1Text: This tool can be used in every streaming software in which you can add a web URL as source and it's really easy to customize to fit your stream layout!
Showcase2Text: You can manage multiple lotterys for different giveway events and usage statistics are stored for a later evaluation. You always can measure your success and report the statistics to your sponsors!
Showcase3Text: Just add a lottery and embed the link in your prefered streaming software. Then publish the public link to your views if you are live and if enough viewers applied for the lottery draw some winners with one click!
I waited so long for such a tool!: I waited so long for such a tool!
This tool is amazing. It's so easy to us: This tool is amazing. It's so easy to use and the statistics are great!
Thanks so much for making these free too: Thanks so much for making this free tool available to us!
